alert.note: Alert for Highlands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL HIGHLANDS AND SOUTHEASTERN POLK COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM EDT... At 142 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles south of Lake Kissimmee to 12 miles northeast of Sebring to near Sebring Regional Airport. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Sebring Regional Airport, Avon Park Air Force Range, Indian Lake Estates, River Ranch, and Lorida. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
